paragraphs.body: The cover of the Collector's Edition of The Complete ${link_0} Collection features ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: The cover of the Collector's Edition of The Complete Book 1 Collection features Aang.

paragraphs.body: The Complete Book 1 Collection (Collector's Edition) is a seven-disc limited collector's edition which includes the entire ${link_0} compilation. It includes several bonus features: an exclusive behind-the scenes documentary, and a special preview edition of the now released ${link_1}.

links.body: Avatar: The Last Airbender—The Art of the Animated Series

paragraphs.text: The Complete Book 1 Collection (Collector's Edition) is a seven-disc limited collector's edition which includes the entire Book One: Water compilation. It includes several bonus features: an exclusive behind-the scenes documentary, and a special preview edition of the now released Avatar: The Last Airbender—The Art of the Animated Series.
